name: AIBuddy: Triage Edition
description:
Diagnose and treat the sick with your AIBuddy companion.

While completely ignorant of even the simplest medical procedures at first, AIBuddy's strength is its ability to learn through observation.

When unable to diagnose or treat a patient, AIBuddy will call you over for assistance. After seeing you do it once, replication is easy.

Fullscreen for best experience.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left click (Hold) - Diagnose, when in range

Right click - Open/close treatment selection menu, when in range

Tab - View AIBuddy's memory of symptoms and illnesses 

Esc - Pause, Audio settings

Entry for Wowie Jam 4

Made in a few days by one person, using Unity, Aseprite, Audacity and Bfxr.

Theme: Collaborate with AI
